name: client-test
description: A test client for the Kui

scripts.test:electron: export PORT_OFFSET=0; npm run watch:electron && kui-testv2; EC=$?; npm run kill; exit $EC
scripts.test:webpack: export PORT_OFFSET=1; npm run watch:webpack && MOCHA_RUN_TARGET=webpack kui-testv2; EC=$?; npm run kill; exit $EC
scripts.test:parallel: KUI_TEST_PARALLEL=true concurrently -n ELECTRON,WEBPACK 'npm run test:electron' 'npm run test:webpack'
scripts.test: npm run test:electron && npm run test:webpack
scripts.watch:webpack: npm run kill; export LOCKFILE="/tmp/kui-build-lock.${PORT_OFFSET-0}"; rm -f $LOCKFILE; rm -rf node_modules/node_modules; (npx kui-watch-webpack &); until [ -f $LOCKFILE ]; do sleep 1; done
scripts.pty:rebuild: if [ -d node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch ]; then cd node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch && npm run install; fi
scripts.pty:electron: if [ -d node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch ]; then if [ ! -e node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc ]; then cp node_modules/@kui-shell/builder/npmrc node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc && npm run pty:rebuild; fi; fi
scripts.pty:nodejs: if [ -e node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc ]; then rm -f node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc; npm run pty:rebuild; fi

author: Mengting Yan
